agents.name: Weather Agent
agents.description: Weather information assistant that helps with forecasts, conditions, and weather-related queries

agents.name: Files Agent
agents.description: File system navigator that helps browse directories, find files, and manage file operations

agents.name: Trading Assistant
agents.description: Stock trading assistant that helps with portfolio management, market analysis, and executing trades

agents.name: Music DJ
agents.description: Music playback assistant that controls the player, manages playlists, and helps discover new tracks

agents.name: Research Librarian
agents.description: Research assistant that helps find, organize, and manage bookmarks across personal and Chrome collections
